ygData.subject: Super Firework?
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone tried making a super firework out of the 4 smaller fireworks? Theres nothing in game to indicate that there is one, but I ve tried a few
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone tried making a super firework out of the 4 smaller fireworks?
Theres nothing in game to indicate that there is one, but I''ve tried a few
combinations nonetheless...

Fwk1 + Fwk2 + Fwk3 + Fwk4
as above + metal twine.

Just interested to see if anyone else has tried anything :)
